================MAS APPROVISIONNEMENT NATIONaux OFGOV|# IE080419 (#DCC)
###Request for Expression of Interest (RFEOI)###
###Construction of Refuelling Tender Garage at 14 Wing Greenwood in Nova Scotia###
======================================================#

 **Tender Title** - Construction of Refuelling Tender Garage at 14 Wing Greenwood
**Reference Number** - MX-42870755762
**Publication Date** - 21st of September, 2023
**Closing Date and Time** - 12th of October, 2023 at 1:00 PM AST

**Background**
Defense Construction Canada (DCC) is inviting general contractors to express their interest in the construction of a new Refuelling Tender Garage at 14 Wing Greenwood in Nova Scotia. The project involves the construction of a 2,558 m2 building and 13,655 m2 site development area. The total budget for this project is estimated at $27 million.

**Documents**
Technical plans and specifications will be made available during the Tender Phase. Interested contractors can access the Standard Construction Contract Documents for Electronic Bidding (DCL 250E) on DCC's website (https://www.dcc-cdc.gc.ca/industry/forms).

**Security Requirements**
Contractors must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by Public Works and Government Services Canada's (PWGSC) Contract Security Program (CSP). In the case of a joint venture, all parties to the joint venture must hold a security clearance.

**Timeline**
DCC will proceed with the Tender Phase around October 19th, 2023. The works shall reach substantial completion no later than 810 calendar days following the notification of contract award and shall be completed no later than 90 calendar days after the substantial completion date.

**Language**
The official language of the contract will be chosen by the contractor in the Electronic Submission System.

 **Joint Venture**
A joint venture is an association of two or more parties that pools their funds, assets, knowledge, expertise, or other resources into a joint business venture. Contractors forming a joint venture must clearly indicate this in the Electronic Submission System and provide the required information.

**Electronic Bidding**
All responses to this RFEOI must be received through the Electronic Bidding System. Electronic Bid documents are available on Merx (http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply; please refer to Merx's pricing website (https://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information.
